svg.text: // THE SQUAD — "EVERY AGENT GETS ONE SHOT TO DO THEIR JOB RIGHT"
"7 different personalities, one common goal — content that never misses"

g.text: WAVE 1 — CONTEXT GATHERING (4 AGENTS IN PARALLEL)

text.tspan: Score. The AI that reviews its own
Every agent answers to this one.

svg.text: "This is not 7 copies of GPT with different system prompts." — Each agent has a named reasoning identity
"LOOK — IF YOU HAD ONE SHOT, OR ONE OPPORTUNITY..."
